# The ffi extension

Configure the `ffi` extension.

This extension provides Foreign Function Interface (FFI) support to run C code
through PHP.

## PHP_EXT_FFI

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_FFI_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
